title: Fricken Liars
body: You're full of shit with your banning system Riot, I had ONE negative game and you guys give me a 14 day suspension, lying stupid pricks. Go fuck off..

replies.body: i doubt you had one negative game with that attitude.
Lol funny because it says only one game in my client and that was the first offense i got. Riot blows dick.
It's possible to skip to a ban for your first offense for severe behavior. Share your chat logs from the in-client reform card so we can see.

You're calling your teammates retards, bad, and just generally being rude to people you don't even know. As DTN said, it is possible to skip punishment tiers for egregious behavior. My advice, if you're sincere about wanting to reform, is to not respond to people who try to antagonize you. Don't go out of your way to call someone bad, just play the game. It takes more effort to be negative than neutral and once your suspension is up, you might find that games are more enjoyable that way.

It takes more effort to be negative than neutral and once your suspension is up, you might find that games are more enjoyable that way.

So, why isn't anyone helping with this?

We can't really 'help', probably not in the sense that you want. We can explain what was likely wrong with your behavior from looking at your chat logs (which is why I requested them), and we can explain how the punishment system works.

Punishment is done in 4 tiers;

* 10 game chat restriction
* 25 game chat restriction
* 14 day account ban
* Permanent account ban

Typically you move up one step each time you are punished, but extreme behavior can result in skipping steps. If you think you were punished unfairly, either by skipping steps or being punished at all for your behavior, you can contest your ban through a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

They send you chat logs as an example of your behavior. It isn't a complete list of everything you have done.

Not exactly sure what you think Riot is lying about since all you did was admit that you were negative and then gave us a little preview of what you look like when you get negative. If you want to say there was some mistake with your punishment, post your logs or submit a support ticket to ask them to review the case. Raging here isn't going to get you anywhere.
Yeah, and where do I send that, I already replied to deep terror Nami, and they haven't said anything now.. That was my ONE offensive game that I posted.

What exactly is your question, or what are you looking for?

It is completely possible to be punished for one extremely egregious game, which happened in your case. It is also possible to skip entire punishment tiers, which you also did. Harassment is not tolerated in League of Legends, and this punishment was deserved.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PcVuKgJp,comment-id=00020000000100000001,timestamp=2016-07-20T20:32:35.826+0000)
>
> What exactly is your question, or what are you looking for?
> 
> It is completely possible to be punished for one extremely egregious game, which happened in your case. It is also possible to skip entire punishment tiers, which you also did. Harassment is not tolerated in League of Legends, and this punishment was deserved.

What in these logs caused him to skip tiers? I didn't see any racial slurs

You don't need to have racial slurs to skip tiers. The level of harassment in those chat logs is what I would consider as excessive to extreme in nature. 

(calling them a 10 year old didn't tilt them like I wanted to, so now I'll call them a 7 year old)

Using chat as a mini-game to ruin the experience for others is not acceptable. There is more harassment than playing the game.

Is this really bad enough to skip entire punishmentlvl based on one game? I have never been banned or restricked or anything and i hope my overal status is pretty good but i must confess that i have been this guy at some stage. You have a bad day and youre on a losingspree. Then your sup is afk and then someone gives you that one rude comment and BOEMM you explode:You tell him 'how it is'; he flames back, a tird guy comes in to temper but also gets flamed which sets him of and before you know it you have a 4 man 15 min ragefest that leaves you so disguested that you turn your pc of for the rest of the day. Is it right? God no. But does he really need to be punished so severly for that one game we all have had?

I've had those games... really hate them.  But I've not once gone raging and flaming.  Well, I did once - but it was on some guy that was just going afk to get the xp in a bot game... that's a personal thing though.

But a bad game, of any level, is no call for flaming.  To say "everybody does it" is completely wrong when majority of games I've played haven't had it, regardless of whether someone was having a bad game or not.  So, since majority of players aren't doing it, I don't think "everybody does it" really fits.

Have you raged? learn to control your temper.  It helps not just in the game but in life in general.

I think you missed my point. I said it wasnt right but i dont think he should have skipped 2 punishment tiers based of one bad game that honestly isnt worse then what i see once every 20 games or so. He didnt use racial or homophobic slurs and didnt wish for any of them to get cancer or something. I dont condone his actions but i think a 10 day chatrestriction would have been enough. 

Maybe to er is human better explains my stance. I dont mean you should behave like this everytime everything goes wrong , i mean that everyone has that one game out of the 1000 games he played where he let himself go. Even yourself had one. It being a botgame doesnt change the fact that you let your emotions got the better of you that one game. And i think having this one spat is more excusable then those million of guys that say  report.... just because someone went 0/3 in lane or missing a smite almost every game.

Im sorry but this last bit is really condencenting. Like you never had an argument in your life?

Sorry if it's condescending to you, but if a person has a problem with their temper then they need to learn to control it.  Saying that people get angry sometimes is no excuse to say "Oh, well people get angry, so it's fine to let them do whatever they want when they are angry."  That's bullshit.  Get angry, do stupid stuff, go for it.  And then pay the consequences.  That's how things work, you do something stupid and then you pay for it sometime later.

I haven't seen what this person said, besides the comment from a rioter that his insults got increasingly worse and a single example was given.  Link me to it if the chat log was posted, but otherwise I sincerely doubt that a couple comments about calling someone 10 and then 7 years old would get a ban like that, it sounds much more like an example of his behavior in that game.

Losing control a little say once a year isnt the same as having an angermanagement problem.
I dont say thats oke but the punishment needs to fit the crime. If you have an argument once with your girl the punishment is that you dont get laid that night. Only if fight regularly or if you hit her or something during that fight its best that she leaves you

Ill post his chatlogs here. Are they really so bad that after hundreds of games with good behavior he needs to skip 2 punishments tiers with this one bad game? Or would a 10 day chatrestriction be enough to get the message across that this kind of behavior is unacceptable even on a bad day.
